Reviews.Author: Lelinda Bourgeois

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_mo17BS3F6I2OYE4/178-8562981-4352302?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo17BS3F6I2OYE4currentClick) { return cv_mo17BS3F6I2OYE4currentClick(); } } } Length:: 7:01 MinsHP 2000-2a20nr 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black)I bought this to travel to Europe so I would not inadvertently loose my very expensive Mac Book Pro. This is a great way to be able to have all of the main things you want and need when you travel. I have been very happy with mine and can see me taking it instead of other expensive Apple products. Its easier to throw away something that costs 350-450 than it does to throw something away that costs 4k !!!! This HP 2000-2a20NR is cheap and comes with enough HD space to cover you, has HD video 1080p etc HDMI output and will suite me very well for my intended purpose and trip to Europe. Hope you like it enough and can see the value enough that you will get yourself one! What have you got to lose? Well maybe you have a $4,000 chance to lose something... but i hope you dont do that! ;)

Reviews.Title: bad keyboard
Reviews.Author: Christo Franklin
Reviews.Content: I do not like the rattle of the keyboard, and have trouble with either no letter appearing or appearing twice, when I press a key. This really slows down typing. I have used the control panel to optimize keyboard responsiveness, already, so I attribute the problem to the keyboard hardware.

Reviews.Title: works but could be faster
Reviews.Author: S. Fischer
Reviews.Content: looking at the stats of this computer it should be a lot better, faster, etc,...normally my laptop starts slowing down after 2 years,I already feel like I should have bought a better one after less than a year,...I guess it's great for average use, but not all too great for professionals with image editing etc,...however I guess a good value for the price,....

Reviews.Title: Do not revommend
Reviews.Author: BJW from MN
Reviews.Content: Warning - back up your hard drive. Almost one year after purchase, my hard drive crashed. Looking online, I find I'm not the only one this has happened to. I do not recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Char
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my Granddaughter for her to use in College.  She just loves it and was the best one to order according to someone who should know Computers.  Has so many wonderful features.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Danyelle
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my fiance to replace his old laptop that was bulky and heated up quite a bit. We like this laptop because it is slimmer and simple but includes all the basic features, including more updates than the old laptop and this HP was offered at a price too good not to try. We have been very pleased with our purchase and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: computer
Reviews.Author: tammy Baughman
Reviews.Content: this is nice laptop but the stupid mouse locks up and you have to restart but is fairly nice for a computer

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, decent performance
Reviews.Author: Justin A. Parr "jparr"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, and I almost ended up keeping it!  Looks good, the keyboard has an excellent tactile feel, and the screen is huge!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: JackieO
Reviews.Content: I spent quite a bit of time researching laptops before buying this one and it paid off.  I'm very happy with it.  I'm not much of a techie but I had no trouble setting it up. It is much faster than my old Toshiba. I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Not Working
Reviews.Author: Nithin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item on August 9 2012 when I was in US [Kansas City]. It's hardware {keyboard] is not working hence I am not able to use it. I'm an Indian and Iam not getting any technical help/support from HP customer care to resolve this issue. I was informed that this product is not yet launched in India and also asked me to contact Amazon. Hence I request you to replace this item asap.
